meaningMnemonic: You already know that 循環 means "circulation," so adding <kanji>container</kanji> makes it what holds things that circulate. They're your <vocabulary>circulatory organ</vocabulary>s. They contain all the blood moving throughout your body like a container.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
